DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Leukemia Subjects : Each criterion follow section must meet order patient eligible enrollment . Only patient clinically diagnose histologically diagnose leukemia eligible participate nontherapeutic study . All patient must measurable quantity leukemic blast peripheral blood detect CBC . No history diabetes experimental group control group . Patients know hepatitis C HIV ( AIDS ) exclude . Patients must inform investigational nature study sign give write informed consent accordance institutional federal guideline . Inclusion Criteria forHealthy Subjects : Subjects must know prior history cancer malignant blood disorder . Where possible , follow carry verify cancer develop since blood collection . This do phone call perform one month sample ask new medical condition arise . Subjects must WBC , RBC , platelet count within normal range CBC . Subjects know hepatitis C HIV ( AIDS ) exclude .
